This app can use the function to display the weather information of the current location. 
To do so, the following permissions must be granted.
%s
Please grant the above permission on the next screen.
If not allowed, the function to display the weather information of the current location cannot be used, but other functions can be used.
About the permissions of this app

This app can use the function to display the weather information of the current location.
For that, the location information function must be available.
Turn on "Use location" on the next screen.
If there is a "Mode" item, it is recommended to select "High accuracy".
The operation method may differ depending on the model.

This app can use the function to display the weather information of the current location.
Normally, GPS can be used as a device to acquire location information, but it has drawbacks such as relatively high power consumption and often not being able to use indoors, so it can be used with Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, cellular networks, etc. We recommend using together.
On the next screen, set the device used to acquire location information.
The operation method may differ depending on the model.
e.g. Touch the "Mode" item, touch the "Wi-Fi and Bluetooth scanning" item, etc.
The current location of the device cannot be known because the location information is unavailable.
You cannot use the function to display the weather forecast because you have unauthorized permissions.

Power saving mode is on.\nThe weather forecast update interval is about 60 minutes.\nThe accuracy of the location information may be about 10km at worst, so you may feel a little lack of accuracy in some cases.
Power saving mode is off.\nThe weather forecast update interval is about 10 minutes.\nLocation information can be expected to be sufficiently accurate for weather forecasts.
Touch after confirming the location information settings.
